CustomField.formula: IF(ISPICKVAL(Account.Type, "Agency"), "Agency", IF(ISPICKVAL(Account.Type, "Marketer"),"Marketer", IF(ISPICKVAL(Account.Type, "Enterprise"), "Enterprise", IF(ISPICKVAL(Account.Type, "Self Service"), "Self Service", CASE( Product__c , "Premier Edition", "Enterprise", "Marketing Premier Edition", "Marketing", "SocialBridge", "Marketing", "Enterprise", "Enterprise", "Marketers", "Marketing", "Team Edition", "Self Service", "Team Plus Edition", "Self Service", "Marketing Professional", "Self Service", "Community Edition", "Self Service", "Company Plan", "Self Service", "Group Edition", "Self Service", "Professional Edition", "Self Service", "Team Plan", "Self Service", "Workgroup Edition", "Self Service", "Free Edition", "Self Service", "Undefined") ) ) ) )
CustomField.label: Product Line
